org.loboevolution.pdfview.font.cid

Class PDFCMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.loboevolution.pdfview.font.cid.PDFCMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToUnicodeMap

    public abstract class PDFCMap
extends Object
    A CMap maps from a character in a composite font to a font/glyph number pair in a CID font. Author jkaplan
